info.Educational Qualifications: PhD degree from VTU Belagavi in the year 2019.MTech degree in Computer Engineering from SJCE, Mysuru with First rank and Gold Medal for VTU, Belagavi in the year 2007.BE degree in Computer Science and Engineering from MIT, Manipal affiliated to Mangalore University in the year 2001.

info.Past Experience: Professor & Head Worked as Associate Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engg at NMAMIT, Nitte since 28 February  2004 (August 2005 – July 2007 deputed for Full Time MTech).Worked as a Project Trainee in Motorola India Pvt Ltd, Bangalore for 1 year (July 2006 – July 2007 as a part of MTech project).Worked as a Lecturer in the Department of Computer Science and Engg at P. A. College of Engineering, Mangalore from March 2002 to February 2004.Worked as Assistant Lecturer in the Department of Information Technology at NITK, Surathkal from August 2001 to March 2002.

info.Areas of Interest: Natural Language ProcessingMachine LearningDeep LearningMobility and Mobile Web ServicesAlgorithms.
